attributes.action: Reduce the Prices of School Meals
attributes.additional_details:
in many places all around the u.k many parents/ students are having to pay extortionate prices just to be fed at school. the average student spends around 3 pounds every school day on there school meal. thats £15 a week !! and on average there are 39 weeks spent at school that is around £585 a year either the student or parents are paying just to feed 1 student at school !!!"
this needs to be REDUCED!!
